func_sig.description: Calculate the arrangements of distinct items considering duplicates.
func_sig.name: calculate_arrangements

duplicates.description: Counts of each duplicated item by their identifier.

total_items.description: Total number of items to arrange.

func_sig.description: Calculate the expected number of rolls given specific outcomes and total days.
func_sig.name: calculate_expected_rolls

days.description: Number of days in the period.

p_rolls.description: The probability of successfully rolling (1 or repeated).

func_sig.description: Calculate the expected number of rolls given specific outcomes and total days, accounting for retries when rolling a 1.
func_sig.name: calculate_expected_rolls_with_retries

days.description: Number of days in the period.

func_sig.description: Calculate the expected number of die rolls for a given number of days and based on the probability of rolling a composite number.
func_sig.name: calculate_expected_rolls_per_year

days.description: Number of days in the period.

rolls_per_day.description: Expected number of rolls per day as a fraction.
